mapper.select: select t.id,u.name as owner,t.money,t.name,t.expectedDate,c.name as customerId,t.stage, t.type,t.source,a.name as activityId,con.name as contactsId,t.description, t.contactSummary,t.nextContactTime,t.createTime,t.createBy,t.editTime,t.editBy from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner = u.id join tbl_customer c on t.customerId = c.id left join tbl_activity a on t.activityId = a.id left join tbl_contacts con on t.contactsId = con.id where t.id = #{id}
